tha-ap264:0.3_0: Hearing oil, the middle, and the junior senior monks.
tha-ap264:1.3_0: He went forth in the Bodhi tree;
tha-ap264:1.4_0: The oil lamp received the oil.
tha-ap264:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap264:2.4_0: this is the fruit and result.
tha-ap264:3.2_0: There is an aristocratic king named Aristocrat,
tha-ap264:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap264:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tagarasikhi.
tha-ap264:6.1_0: The senior monk with oil lamps, and the second part of the senior monks.
